attributes.action: ensure all colleges in UK have a sleeping hall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
create a sleeping hall at all colleges, for students who need to sleep and may have a long gap between lessons in which they could recooperate.

THIS WILL HELP COMBAT LACK OF CONCERTRATION IN STUDENTS IN YEARS 12-13

rejection.details: Please provide both your first and last name when submitting a petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
